attributes.additional_details: After the horrendous scenes on our streets and these mindless criminals looting shops burning properties and cars on the streets our police were helpless,  what happened to water canons and rubber bullets?these criminals should they get caught will hide behind and use the humans rights to their advantage, we need to change the law so should anyone commit a crime they loose their human rights, as they have committed a crime our prisons are full so what are we going to do to these 100s of criminals? Let them use human rights and get off their crimes
